metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20839 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
libvncclient/sockets.c in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13 has a buffer overflowvia a long socket filename.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.13+dfsg-1').
x11vnc package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
veyon package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
